text: Ali Dad (born 1964) is a former Afghan wrestler, who competed at the 1988 Summer Olympic Games in the featherweight event,Sports-Reference Profile but was suspended after testing positive for diuretics., LA Times, October 01, 1988 ==References== Category:Wrestlers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Afghan male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of Afghanistan Category:Afghan sportspeople in doping cases Category:Doping cases in wrestling Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Ali Dad
